html:
PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2017-04042017-04-13PCH,  ,  ,  , 
ActBroadcasting Act
SubjectCanadian Broadcasting Corporation ** purchase, sale and lease **
PrecisOrder approving that the CANADIAN BROADCASTING CORPORATION (1) as vendor, enter into an agreement of purchase and sale with Société en Commandite La Nouvelle Maison controlled by SOCIÉTÉ EN COMMANDITE BROCCOLINI NO.3, as purchaser, to dispose of approximately 235 000 square feet of real property located at 1400 René-Levesque Boulevard East in Montreal, Quebec for a total consideration in excess of $4,000,000; and (2) as tenant, enter into a lease agreement with Société en Commandite La Nouvelle Maison controlled by Société en Commandite Broccolini No.3, as landlord, to rent the new Maison de Radio-Canada.
AttachmentsAttachment
